scripts.ganache:docker: (yarn ganache:docker:kill 2> /dev/null || true) && sudo docker build -t arcadeum/ganache-cli ganache && sudo docker run -p 8545:8545 arcadeum/ganache-cli -d -e 1000000000 -g 1 -l 4000000000000000
scripts.ganache:docker:verbose: (yarn ganache:docker:kill 2> /dev/null || true) && sudo docker build -t arcadeum/ganache-cli ganache && sudo docker run -p 8545:8545 arcadeum/ganache-cli -d -e 1000000000 -g 1 -l 4000000000000000 -v
scripts.ganache:docker:kill: sudo docker rm -f `sudo docker ps -a -q -f expose=8545`
scripts.testrpc: echo '*** DEPRECATED: please use "yarn ganache" instead ***' && yarn ganache
scripts.testrpc:verbose: echo '*** DEPRECATED: please use "yarn ganache:verbose" instead ***' && yarn ganache:verbose
